name: Cloudterminal-win
tagline: Automatically retreive instance details from EC2 and connect over RDP, within a UX optimised for administration, debugging and productivity. Built in WPF and C# on .Net using the MSTSC ActiveX control for RDP.
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Automatically retreive instance details from EC2 and connect over RDP, within a UX optimised for administration, debugging and productivity. Built in WPF and C# on .Net using the MSTSC ActiveX control for RDP.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
